snippet: Twitter's chubby blue bird, with its playful tuft of feathers and disproportionately small wings, is out. In its place is a sleeker version with an upturned beak.
abstract: Twitter's chubby blue bird, with its playful tuft of feathers and disproportionately small wings, is out. In its place is a sleeker version with an upturned beak.

headline.main: As Twitter Matures, a New Bird Emerges
